mapper.insert: insert into seats(mid,mvcode,thname, schall, sctime, sid, stype, sdate) values(#{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mvcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{thname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{schall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
